text: @_dedenne__ @trahana @CNN So what is your argument? By the data, I believe this virus is overblown and not much worse statistically than the flu. We have prevented herd immunity with quarantines, cost millions their jobs and livelihoods and killed thousands of elderly due to bad governors.
